statements: SELECT * FROM user_login_info;
SELECT username, email FROM user_login_info WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_login_info WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_login_info ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_login_info WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_login_info WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_login_info WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_login_info WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_login_info WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com' AND password_hash = '123456';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_login_info WHERE user_id > 2 ORDER BY username DESC, email ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT u.username, us.login_time FROM users u JOIN user_sessions us ON u.id = us.user_id;
SELECT u.id, u.username, us.login_time FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_sessions us ON u.id = us.user_id WHERE us.session_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users_login;
SELECT username FROM users_login WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users_login WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users_login WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users_login WHERE username LIKE '%smith%' AND user_id < 500;
SELECT * FROM users_login WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users_login WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users_login WHERE username = 'Alice' AND user_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM users_login WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users_login;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, user_profiles.age FROM users JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id;
SELECT users.username, login_attempts.attempt_timestamp FROM users JOIN login_attempts ON users.user_id = login_attempts.user_id WHERE login_attempts.attempt_timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'jane@example.com';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id > 5;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE password_hash = 'hashed_password';

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
